plugin.name: Consider_info
plugin.author: Nick Gammon
plugin.description: When you type "consider" (or "consider all") the lines are coloured to make it easier to tell high level from low level mobs.

trigger.match: You would stomp * into the ground.
trigger.name: a

trigger.match: * would be easy, but is it even worth the work out?
trigger.name: b

trigger.match: No Problem! * is weak compared to you.
trigger.name: c

trigger.match: * looks a little worried about the idea.
trigger.name: d

trigger.match: ^(.*?) chuckles at the thought of you fighting (him|her|it)\.$
trigger.name: g

trigger.match: Best run away from * while you can!
trigger.name: h

trigger.match: Challenging * would be either very brave or very stupid.
trigger.name: i

trigger.match: * would crush you like a bug!
trigger.name: j

trigger.match: You would be completely annihilated by *!
trigger.name: m

muclient.script:
consider_messages = { a = { range = "-19 and below", colour = "gray", }, b = { range = "-10 to -19", colour = "darkgreen", }, c = { range = "-6 to -9", colour = "forestgreen", }, d = { range = "-2 to -6", colour = "chartreuse", }, e = { range = "-2 to +2", colour = "springgreen", }, f = { range = "+2 to +3", colour = "darkgoldenrod", }, g = { range = "+3 to +8", colour = "gold", }, h = { range = "+8 to +16", colour = "tomato", }, i = { range = "+16 to +21", colour = "crimson", }, j = { range = "+21 to +32", colour = "lightpink", }, k = { range = "+32 to +41", colour = "darkmagenta", }, l = { range = "+41 to +50", colour = "darkviolet", }, m = { range = "+50 and above", colour = "magenta", }, } -- end of consider_messages
function adapt_consider (name, line, wildcards) mob = consider_messages [name] if mob then ColourNote (mob.colour, "", line .. " (" .. mob.range .. ")" ) else ColourNote ("white", "blue", "Could not find message for trigger: " .. line) end -- if end -- adapt_consider
